meanings.definition: Manipulate boundaries to favor one party or class
meanings.sent1: The politician gerrymanders the voting districts to help their friends win.
meanings.sent2: It is unfair when someone gerrymanders the borders to make sure they always win.
meanings.sent3: The sneaky fox gerrymanders the path to the henhouse to get there faster.
meanings.sent4: Her smile gerrymanders its way into everyone's heart, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The artist gerrymanders the colors on the canvas, creating a beautiful masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The act of manipulating boundaries for political gain
meanings.sent1: The gerrymanders in the election caused a lot of controversy.
meanings.sent2: People are tired of the gerrymanders that happen in politics.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show joked about the gerrymanders in a hilarious skit.
meanings.sent4: The shadow of doubt looms over the gerrymanders in the city council.
meanings.sent5: The history books will remember the gerrymanders of this era.
